channel.title: [pi] I-Soul [Pi]
channel.description:
[center]Hey everyone welcome to the developement thread for ISoul as you know my old server Soul-kingdom has been alright for the last week but i feel that i haven't added enough to it so iam gonna start a new server :D This server will have the features listed below : 602 animations and gfx's 100% dragon claws formula 508 maps packed into the cache 633 items models most new items most new npc's Working curse prayers and much more The base we'll be using is : Project Insanity The client base we'll be using is : Galkon's refractored Combat systems The combat systems will be redone from scratch and they will be brought up from the beginning and they will be as close to runescape's as possible for the perfect game expierience. Hosting : We will be hosting the server off of a quadcore 8gb dedicated server. Forums : The forums will be Vbulletin 4.1.0 based What we need are : 2x Client Developers 2x gfxers 1x Vbulletin coder If you 'd like to apply for a spot then please use this format :
Your msn : What are you applying for : How long have you been doing it : Why do you wish to apply : How long are you able to be online for :
Thank you for taking the time to view this decelopement team To contact me add my msn at : Soul-kingdom@hotmail.com[/center] [center]The Team : Server Developers : Jamal123 Client Developers : artem543 Gfxers : None atm Vbulletin coders : SunSpec221[/center]

[center]Hey everyone welcome to the developement thread for ISoul as you know my old server Soul-kingdom has been alright for the last week but i feel that i haven’t added enough to it so iam gonna start a new server

This server will have the features listed below :

602 animations and gfx’s

508 maps packed into the cache
633 items models
most new items
most new npc’s
Working curse prayers
and much more

The base we’ll be using is : Project Insanity
The client base we’ll be using is : Galkon’s refractored

Combat systems
The combat systems will be redone from scratch and they will be brought up from the beginning and they will be as close to runescape’s as possible for the perfect game expierience.

Hosting :

We will be hosting the server off of a quadcore 8gb dedicated server.

Forums :

The forums will be Vbulletin 4.1.0 based

What we need are :

2x Client Developers
2x gfxers
1x Vbulletin coder

If you 'd like to apply for a spot then please use this format :
